SELECT book_name, publisher, book_content, price, publication, img, writer, num FROM (SELECT book_name, publisher, book_content, price, publication, img, writer, rownum as num FROM (SELECT book_name, publisher, book_content, price, publication, img, writer FROM GOODS1 where book_category=#{category} ORDER BY publication DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT book_code, book_name, book_category, writer, publisher, amount, out_of_print, pages, book_content, price, publication, img, num FROM (SELECT book_code, book_name, book_category, writer, publisher, amount, out_of_print, pages, book_content, price, publication, img, rownum as num FROM (SELECT book_code, book_name, book_category, writer, publisher, amount, out_of_print, pages, book_content, price, publication, img FROM GOODS1 WHERE book_category=#{category} ORDER BY publication DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
